attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The website was so glitchy I could barely click anything. So many glitches I couldn’t click anything. This isn’t even an app for a phone it’s an app for a microwave. Horrible this never happens on anything else except for this. Never ever again. Wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Disappointed Citizen
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get to know my racist homophobic president a little bit more and once I clicked the app Melania Trump HERSELF came to my door and set me on fire 😥😥😥. Now I suffer from third degree burns AND she took my dog. Now my instagram has been hacked and I am banned from every movie theater in the entire world. In heat broken please never download this app.

attributes.title: Liberal app made by witches
attributes.review: After downloading the app, my phone crashed. I put it in rice, and luckily now I can turn it back on - but when I went into the app to get all the latest news on our favorite president, I got THIS flashing message: “if you don’t vote for Biden, you and 10 people you love will die.” THIS IS A LIBERAL APP. They are THREATENING MY LIFE. Made by the witches... do NOT download!!

attributes.title: IT TELLING ME TO KILL MYSELF
attributes.review: this app is being a bit RACISTTTTTTTTT. quote on quote “go kill urself u black n-word” WITH A HARD R. this is absurd and shall report this to the authorities. ORANGE SMALL D1CK PRESIDENT IM GOING TO SLAUGHTER YOU AND BOIL UR ORGANS!!! this app is horrendous. it’s supporting people to kill them selves. and i suffer from great depression and anxiety do to the president all ready, and by this app my mental health state is getting way worse and causes me to have seizures and heart attack. THE PRESIDENT AND GOVERMENT TO PROMOTING DEATH UPON US ALLLLL!!

attributes.title: THE APP HAS VIRUSES - BEWARE
attributes.review: i downloaded this app for informational purposes only because CNN and Fox News are FAKE NEWS from the leftists ❤️😩 but when i opened the app, it started glitching out of no where and i got a virus (i think it’s coronavirus 😳🙈) on my phone. all of a sudden, BTS started playing out of nowhere and soon i was hypnotized by a strange beeping sound 👁👄👁 this app is NOT safe!!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app took 3 hours to load which was already a terrible start.  I then opened the app, and my phone began to glitch.  My screen went black and then shut off.  It took another few hours for my phone to turn on again.  If you are thinking about downloading this... DON’T.

attributes.title: Bugs and Glitches on this bad app
attributes.review:
The app is SUPER glitchy and I don’t think that it should be up in the App Store. The download time took FOREVER. Also it did not let me go to links and it would log me out every time I would go on it. This app should definitely get taken down. 

I hate it. In conclusion, This app is horrible

attributes.title: Do not download!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I could educate myself more on the president of the United States of America but I when I downloaded it made my phone lag so bad and then even worse! It made my grandma have 8 heart attacks and die it also made my dog turn into a bird and fly away and I also got a deadly brain tumor I am so disappointed DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Unimaginably Boring
attributes.review: What is the point in getting this app? All this app does is spew the same falsities that his entire campaign is based upon. The hypocrisy of this administration is so unfathomably awful that I’m sure it will go down in history, but not for the way they want it to. Don’t get this app unless you’re a white supremacist living under a rock.

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: This app is honestly terrible. I do not recommend downloading at all. Not only does it have a lot of glitches, but it crashes all the time too! I’m definitely deleting this app. But that’s not it, my dog LOVES trump. She considers herself his biggest fan. Has All his Cheeto merch, and everything. And she even hates this app. Take this down instead of tiktok!!
